name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Frontend Developer with 13+ years of experience specializing in high-performance applications, particularly in Angular and TypeScript. Proficient in HTML5, SCSS, and RxJS, with a strong focus on implementing Microfrontends and Module Federation to create dynamic, scalable web applications. Experienced in building Single Page Applications (SPAs) using Angular, enhancing user experience through ReactiveForms and state management.
Skilled in version control and collaboration tools including Git, GitHub, and GitLab, with a solid track record in managing Pull Requests effectively. Familiar with CI/CD pipelines to streamline development processes and promote efficient deployment. Background in diverse industries, integrating compliance standards into the development lifecycle, and adept at using project management methodologies like Kanban.
Additionally, I bring a wealth of knowledge in full stack development, with capabilities in Python, JavaScript, and various frameworks such as React and Next.js, along with cloud services on AWS and Azure.
